mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} AND operator_no = #{operatorNumber} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_delivery_info_details (order_no, logistic_status, create_time, description, operation_type, operator_no, warehouse_no, task_no, picture) SELECT #{orderNo}, #{logisticStatus}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{operationType}, #{operatorNo}, #{warehouseNo}, #{taskNo}, #{picture} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} AND logistic_status = #{logisticStatus} );
mapper.update:
UPDATE ord_delivery_info_details
order_no = #{orderNo},
warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo},
operator_no = #{operatorNo},
operation_type = #{operationType},
is_read = #{isRead}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT e.`name` deliveryName, e.mobile deliveryPhone, e.pic_url pictuerUrl, odi.order_no orderNumber, oli.warehouse warehouseName FROM ord_delivery_info_details AS odi INNER JOIN emp_employee AS e ON e.delivery_clerk_no = odi.operator_no INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON oli.ord_no = odi.order_no WHERE odi.order_no = #{orderNumber} AND odi.operator_no = #{operatorNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address shippingAddress, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no AND obi.delivery_status = odid.logistic_status INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no LEFT JOIN ord_arrears_audit AS oaa ON oaa.ord_no = obi.ord_no WHERE obi.delivery_status = 'SEALED_CAR' AND ( oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_NO' OR oaa.`status` IS NULL ) AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo} ORDER BY odid.create_time DESC

SELECT ord_no orderNumber FROM ord_arrears_audit oat LEFT JOIN ord_delivery_info_details ord ON oat.ord_no = ord.order_no WHERE ord.operator_no = #{operatorNo} AND ord.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' AND ( STATUS = 'AUDITING' OR STATUS = 'AUDIT_PASSED' )

SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address shippingAddress, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount, obd.online_pay_type onlinePayType FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no WHERE obi.ord_no = #{orderNumber} AND odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo}

select.if: SELECT odid.* FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON odid.order_no = obi.ord_no WHERE obi.customer_id = #{userID} AND obi.create_time >= #{createTime} AND (odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' OR odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL') ORDER BY obi.create_time

SELECT odid.* FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON odid.order_no = obi.ord_no WHERE obi.creator_id = #{userID} AND obi.create_time >= #{createTime} AND (odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' OR odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL') ORDER BY obi.create_time

SELECT odid.* FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON odid.order_no = obi.ord_no WHERE obi.sales_consult_id = #{userID} AND obi.create_time >= #{createTime} AND (odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' OR odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL') ORDER BY obi.create_time

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT orli.return_no returnNumber, orli.rejecter receiver, orli.rejecter_phone receiverPhone, obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, orli.return_full_address pickUpAddress, orli.delivery_time pickUpTime FROM ord_return_logistic_info AS orli INNER JOIN ord_return_base_info AS orbi ON orli.return_no = orbi.return_no INNER JOIN ord_base_info AS obi ON obi.ord_no = orbi.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail AS ordd ON ordd.return_no = orli.return_no WHERE orbi.return_status = 'RETURNING' AND ordd.return_logistic_status = 'PICKING_GOODS' AND orli.delivery_clerk_no = #{operatorNo} ORDER BY ordd.create_time DESC;

SELECT orli.return_no returnNumber, orli.rejecter receiver, orli.rejecter_phone receiverPhone, obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, orli.return_full_address pickUpAddress, orli.delivery_time pickUpTime FROM ord_return_logistic_info AS orli INNER JOIN ord_return_base_info AS orbi ON orli.return_no = orbi.return_no INNER JOIN ord_base_info AS obi ON obi.ord_no = orbi.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail AS ordd ON ordd.return_no = orli.return_no WHERE ordd.return_logistic_status = 'PICKING_GOODS' AND orli.delivery_clerk_no = #{operatorNo} AND orbi.return_no = #{returnNumber}

SELECT orgi.retail_price, orgi.return_qty qty, gg.sku_name, gg.gid goodsId, gg.goods_specification, gg.cover_image_uri, gg.goods_unit FROM ord_return_goods_info AS orgi INNER JOIN gds_goods AS gg ON orgi.sku = gg.sku WHERE orgi.return_no = #{returnNumber}
SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} AND logistic_status = #{logisticStatus}

SELECT DISTINCT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address shippingAddress, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount, 'y' isOrderOrReturnOrder, IF(obi.delivery_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL',IF(oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_PASSED',oaa.update_time,odid.create_time),odid.create_time ) createTime FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no AND obi.delivery_status = odid.logistic_status INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no LEFT JOIN ord_arrears_audit AS oaa ON oaa.ord_no = obi.ord_no WHERE ( odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL' OR odid.logistic_status = 'REJECT')
AND( oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_PASSED' OR oaa.`status` IS NULL ) AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo} AND (oaa.update_time >= DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -6 MONTH ) OR odid.create_time >= DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -6 MONTH )) UNION SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, orli.return_no orderNumber, orli.return_full_address shippingAddress, orli.delivery_time deliveryTime, orli.rejecter receiver, orli.rejecter_phone receiverPhone, ordd.task_no shipperNumber, 0, 'n' isOrderOrReturnOrder, ordd.create_time createTime
FROM ord_return_logistic_info AS orli INNER JOIN ord_return_base_info AS orbi ON orli.return_no = orbi.return_no INNER JOIN ord_base_info AS obi ON obi.ord_no = orbi.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail AS ordd ON ordd.return_no = orli.return_no WHERE ordd.return_logistic_status = 'PICKUP_COMPLETE' AND orli.delivery_clerk_no = #{operatorNo} AND ordd.create_time >= DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -6 MONTH ) ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT obi.ord_no number FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no AND obi.delivery_status = odid.logistic_status INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no LEFT JOIN ord_arrears_audit AS oaa ON oaa.ord_no = obi.ord_no WHERE ( odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL' OR odid.logistic_status = 'REJECT' ) AND ( oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_PASSED' OR oaa.`status` IS NULL ) AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo} UNION SELECT DISTINCT orli.return_no number FROM ord_return_logistic_info AS orli INNER JOIN ord_return_base_info AS orbi ON orli.return_no = orbi.return_no INNER JOIN ord_base_info AS obi ON obi.ord_no = orbi.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail AS ordd ON ordd.return_no = orli.return_no WHERE ordd.return_logistic_status = 'PICKUP_COMPLETE' AND orli.delivery_clerk_no = #{operatorNo}) temp
